name: goodbye
desc: The server intends to close the connection soon..
long_desc: The server intends to close the connection soon.. The goodbye event may be sent by a server that expects it will close the connection after an unspecified amount of time. A well formed client should reconnect to avoid data loss. Other scenarios where you might encounter the goodbye event are: -  reaching the maximum duration of a RTM web socket connection (8 hours) -  your workspace has been inactive for over two minutes
